title: Evan Peters Reacts to His Most Famous Killing Scene on AHS
author: TheWrap
comment: We just posted our latest "Rewind" with Stranger Thing's Noah Schnapp. Check it out: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PgweSFgc9Jw
Evan Peters, Sarah Paulson and Jessica Lange are the holy trinity of AHS

He completely depleted his mental, emotional and physical health AND his social and family life FOR Kai Anderson and stiLL he wasn't even nominated let alone WIN an award. An Emmy would've been perfect but no. wow.
I feel like he would've made a better Jeffrey Dahmer than Ross Lynch in My Friend Dahmer. No offense to Ross.
“most famous killing scene on AHS”. hey TheWrap, ever watched Murder House?!?
description:
Evan Peters was cool enough to watch one of his most famous death scenes from American Horror Story Season 7. We got him to sit down and watch the scene with us and react, until that tenuous moment where his co-star, Billy Lourd's neck cracks.

Ummmm....crack, he says. If you think you've seen every single Evan Peters character scene, check out our interview with him. By the way, this is one of the same scenes Evan Peters talked about when Peters was on Conan. 

Follow our host / interviewer Jennifer Maas: @jmaas421
